item.title: Meltwater Engage - Degraded Performance
item.content:encoded:
[High] - Major Issue with loading Engage and Social Connections

Engineering is investigating a critical issue that is impacting non-English language users. This indicates a major outage that is affecting a large number of users. [High] - Major Outage Causing Language Loading Issue

Non-English language users are experiencing a critical issue with loading Engage and Social Connections. This suggests a major outage that is affecting a significant number of users.

Update - Users may change their default language to English to resolve the issue.

This impacts non-English language users. Engineering is aware of this and is currently investigating. We will continue to provide updates accordingly.

We apologize for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience.

item.title: Required action needed for LinkedIn Connections in Meltwater Engage
item.content:encoded:

Resolved - Meltwater was recently notified of a LinkedIn API change that impacts all owned LinkedIn connections in Meltwater Engage.
